edu.uab.ssg.io.plink

Class PEDParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uab.ssg.io.plink.PEDParser

  • public final class PEDParser
extends Object
    A parser for the PLINK PED input file format described in the basic usage/data formats section of the online documentation. The first six columns are:

    Family ID
    Individual ID
    Paternal ID
    Maternal ID
    Sex (1=male; 2=female; other=unknown)
    Phenotype

    Additional columns are for specifying genotypes. The test.ped file from the PLINK binary distribution is included below as an example.

    1 1 0 0 1 1 A A G T
    2 1 0 0 1 1 A C T G
    3 1 0 0 1 1 C C G G
    4 1 0 0 1 2 A C T T
    5 1 0 0 1 2 C C G T
    6 1 0 0 1 2 C C T T

    Also see the hapmap1.ped file in the PLINK tutorial example data archive.
    Author:
    Jelai Wang

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public void parse(InputStream in,
                  PEDParser.RecordListener listener)
           throws IOException
        Parses the input stream for sample records.
        Parameters:
        in - The input stream, typically a file input stream, of the file to be parsed.
        listener - As the input stream is parsed, each sample record is passed to the user-supplied record listener.
        Throws:
        IOException
